title: Notes on Low E String (6th String)
description: Master the foundation of the guitar. Learn all notes on the Low E string (Reference string for chords/scales).

title: Notes on A String (5th String)
description: Memorize the A string. Essential for root-5 barre chords and finding your way around the neck.

title: Notes on D String (4th String)
description: Learn the D string notes. The center of the fretboard and key for triad shapes.

title: Notes on G String (3rd String)
description: Master the G string. Often tricky due to the tuning interval, but vital for solos and bends.

title: Notes on B String (2nd String)
description: Learn the B string notes. Crucial for melody lines and understanding chord inversions.

title: Notes on High E String (1st String)
description: Memorize the High E string. Mirrors the Low E string, doubling your fretboard knowledge instantly.

title: Find All 'C' Notes
description: Locate every C note on the fretboard. The most common root note in music. Master its positions.

title: Find All 'G' Notes
description: Locate every G note. A fundamental key for guitarists. See the pattern of Gs across the neck.

title: Find All 'D' Notes
description: Find every D note on the guitar. Essential for navigating D-based chords and tunings.

title: Find All 'A' Notes
description: Locate every A note. The standard tuning reference pitch (A440). Know exactly where they are.

title: Find All 'E' Notes
description: Find every E note. With two E strings, this note appears most often. Master its geography.

title: Find All 'F' Notes
description: The F note has no open string (in standard tuning). Find all the fretted F notes instantly.

title: Find All 'B' Notes
description: Locate every B note. The leading tone to C. Vital for resolving melodies.

title: Find All 'F#' (F Sharp) Notes
description: Master the black keys! F# is the first sharp in the circle of fifths. Learn its spots.

title: Find All 'Bb' (B Flat) Notes
description: Common in jazz and blues (Key of F). Find all Bb notes on the fretboard.

title: First Position Notes (Frets 0-3)
description: Master the 'Open Position'. The first 3 frets where most open chords live. Essential for beginners.

title: Middle Neck Notes (Frets 5-8)
description: The 'Box 1' area for A Minor Pentatonic. Learn the notes in this crucial soloing zone.

title: Upper Neck Notes (Frets 9-12)
description: Approaching the octave. Learn the notes leading up to the 12th fret double-dots.
